data.name: Epoch Of Love
data.detailed_description:
About new game - «Epoch Of Love»


“Epoch Of Love” is a visual novel with hentai elements. An exciting journey through time and space awaits you. Adventure can be dangerous and funny, soft and intoxicating, but always pleasant. Capture the hearts of hot girls and get the long awaited ending. Making the right choice and successfully passing tests will make your path easier. And don't forget, your decisions have consequences...

What will you get from the game:


  • Mini-games are ready to test your speed, alertness and endurance.

  • Unique stories for each girl.

  • Beautiful graphics and design.

  • Unobtrusive music and colorful illustrations.

  • An opportunity to relax and have a great time.

Artist: https://twitter.com/AwayFuton3

data.short_description: "Epoch Of Love" is a unique hentai novel with lots of hot girls! Here you can feel like a hero of different events and eras! You will get incredible pleasure from the game and its gameplay!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Series or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WINDOWS® 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Series or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX® 9.0c)
  • Additional Notes: This requirements are not final
